entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Baker Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:22 PM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -38.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Baker Lake Airport 01:00 AM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -38.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 62 %
Wind Chill: -56
Dewpoint: -43.2°C
Wind: NW 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 34 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Blowing snow at times overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h increasing to 40 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 34 by morning. Wind chill minus 57 this evening and minus 50 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 31.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Blowing snow at times. Wind northwest 40 km/h. High minus 31. Wind chill minus 53 in the morning and minus 47 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Blowing snow at times. Wind northwest 40 km/h. Low minus 34. Wind chill near minus 51. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023
